# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those looking for top-quality solutions. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I'm extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at an introductory price of $200. This offer is tailored to appreciate your consideration and ensure you experience the full potential of our product. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your needs with our superior offering. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
